Articles.Content:
Hi everyone, I'm new to the forums, but not to KSP.

I found out about this game through a LP not by one of the usual suspects, but by a British LP'er named Kikoskia, who did a few videos of the game, and decided I had try it out.

I have since managed to get landers on the Mun and Minmus, as well as a decent satellite network going.

In real life, I'm a pharmacy technician with a degree in criminal justice, so I'm about as far from a rocket scientist as you can get, but something tells me that is not really a problem here.

Welcome to the forums!

If you need help with anything, just ask. We'll be happy to help you!

Well, I know one of my friends is thinking of becoming a pharmacy technician for the pay...

You have a pretty interesting degree variety, and I like that KSP is attracting people from every field. There's still really odd fields I wonder if we have people from... I'll bet that your satellite network might become useful in a future career mode update. Anyhow, welcome to the forums!
